item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Nima304 Nima304
item.description:
@Nima304 wrote:

well i can help you about the wild

this is exactly like setting safezones, just a different code

public boolean singleWild() {
if(absX >= 3069 && absX <= 3118 && absY >= 3522 && absY <=3537)
return true;
else
return false;
}
^^^1v1 wild^^^

and if you don’t lose items in the wild, search this;
public boolean loseNoItems()

and remove the boolean and everything under it

-Nima304

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @ihackgames ihackgames
item.description:
@ihackgames wrote:

OK first off i am using deltascape… and i want to know how you make it so u loose items in the wild
and
i tried 10 diffrent yell commands to c if they would work
none did but the most recent one worked best but i go two errors
this is the command i used

if(command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { command = command.replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay"); command = command.replaceAll("servegame", "imgay"); if(muted == 0) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); else sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell."); }

but then i got this

client.java:7677: incomparable types: boolean and int if(muted == 0 ) ^ client.java:7680: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell."); ^ 2errors Press any key to continue . . .

i really need help
help if u can
thx
-ihackgames

Read full topic
